args.description: Command line argument validator and storage structure.

mode.description: The high-level operation that this tool is to perform.

item_attributes_out.description: Name of a file to write info about all of the EvE inventory items to.

item_attributes_in.description: Name of a file to read info about all of the EvE inventory items to.

station_attributes_in.description: Name of a file to to read for static infomation about a market station such as its ID, region, and solar system.

prices_out.description: Live market buy and sell prices for specific items at specific stations.

item_attribute.description: Static information about one inventory item in EvE.

id.description: Integral uniquifier used by the EvE Swagger API.

name.description: Name of an item, such as Tritanium.

item_ids.description: Set of valid integral uniquifiers used by the EvE Swagger API.

station_attribute.description: Static information about an NPC station in EvE

name.description: The name of a station, such as 'Jita IV - Moon 4 - Caldari Navy Assembly Plant'

station_id.description: The integral uniquifier for this station, as used by the EvE swagger interface.

system_id.description: The integral uniquifier for the solar system containing this station, as used by the EvE swagger interface.

region_id.description: The integral uniquifier for the region containing this station, as used by the EvE swagger ubterface,

raw_regional_market.description: Orders fetched directly from the Swagger API with minimal post-processing.  These are post-processed into galactic_market objects later.

raw_order.description: A standing buy or sell offer at a specific station fetched directly from the swagger API with minimal post-processing.

price.description: The asking buy or sell price for this order.

item_id.description: Integral uniquifier of an inventory item in EvE.

galactic_market.description: Zero or more regions containing market hubs

regional_market.description: Zero or more market bearing stations within a single region.  These are post-processed orders.

region_id.description: Integral uniquifier of this region as used by the EvE Swagger interface

station_market.description: A station capable of selling zero or more item types.

station_id.description: Integral uniquifier of this station as used by the EvE Swagger interface

item_market.description: All of the buy and sell orders for one specific item at a station.

item_id.description: Integral uniquifier of this item as used by the EvE Swagger interface
